summary: Luzie is a standalone follower. Combat: 1H weapon dual wielding. You can choose between 2 hairstyles.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11596/?]Ported to SSE by bchick3[/url][/b][/size]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85942-13-1502397841.jpg[/img]


[size=5]Luzie Standalone Follower[/size]

[size=4]UNP/CBBE[/size]

Details:

Name: Luzie
Body: UNP UNPB & HDT / CBBE curvy
High: 1.0
Weight: 100
Race: Nord
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=2]Protection: Essential[/size][/font]
Levels with Player, Lev. 6 - 250
Voice Type: Female commander or female eventoned (Optional Files)
Combat Style: Custom / 1H Dual Wielding
Spells: Healing
Perks: LightFoot, DualFlurry, DualSavegery, Bladesman & more
Armor: Draugr armor (AleaÂ´s armor) Light armor with custom stats
Weapon: Steel dagger with custom stats

[size=4]Location: Dawnstar, The Mortar and Pestle[/size]

You can choose between 2 hairstyles:

[size=4]Hairstyle 1 Main File:[/size]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85942-14-1502397841.jpg[/img]

[size=4]Hairstyle 2 Optional File[/size]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85942-15-1502397841.jpg[/img][/center][center][size=4]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/center][color=#ead1dc][size=3]If u dont like the female commander voice, you can download under optional files an esp with the female eventoned voice.
There are 2 versions, one is for the main file and the other for the 2 hair file.
[/size][/color][center][size=4]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/center]
[center][size=3]Little dance video.[/size] ;)

[youtube]yHoiCRB8HzQ[/youtube][/center]
[center][/center]



You can see here pictures from an earlier preset of her: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/669569]Pics 1[/url] & [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/669626]Pics 2[/url]

Requirements for the HDT Bodys: UNP, UNPB & UNPCM

For the HDT bodys under miscellaneous you need a compatible skeleton...
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url].


CREDITS:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]
BodySlide, Outfit Studio[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]CBBE Body[/url] by Ousnius and Caliente
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE [/url]by Groovtama
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]unp [/url]by dimon99
unpcm by Halofarm
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996]HDT Physics Extensions[/url] by HydrogensaysHDT
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu[/url] by Expired
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73853]PureSkinTexture[/url] by Anini n Regenbot03
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] by HHaleyy
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by Gabriel Mailhot as LogRaam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72825]Maevan2's eye brows [/url]by Maevan2


Tools:

Nifskope
Nifmerge
TES5Edit

enb: tweaked rudy enb


[center][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1020554/?tb=mods&pUp=1][/url][/size][/center][center][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1020554/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My other Mods[/url][/size]
